help.name: m.help
help.description: I'll respond with this help command.

play.name: m.play
play.description: I will play a video/music. I can take a URL from various services (YouTube, Vimeo, YouKu, etc). You can also search using a string.

skip.name: m.skip
skip.description: I will skip the specified number of songs

queue.name: m.queue
queue.description: I will display the current music/audio queue.

volume.name: m.volume
volume.description: I'll adjust the audio playback volume [1-200]

leave.name: m.leave
leave.description: I will clear the music/audio queue and leave the voice channel.
